Summary: Saw star like object come in from south and stop then leave with a another.
divs: Sighting Detailswas leaving car with wife and looking at stars,, saw a object coming from the south,, thought it might be a satilight, watch for a few sec more then object stop moving stayed for 10 sec, then saw one coming from north then stop by the one,then bouth took off south at a high rate of speed
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around April 22nd 2010
